Epics In Progress
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Epics In Progress
This section is exclusively for the continuing stories in the Reign of the Master, MR World, The Story of Leo, The Line, A Warrior's Trek, The Wind Doesn't Cry, and Youth series.
Only the authors of those series may post here, in order to complete their epics.
If you want to start a new series, please go to the most recent Epics In Progress section.
(Right now that would be Epics In Progress, Section III)
